text: How can I consume a WSDL (SOAP) web service in Python?
I want to use a WSDL SOAP based web service in Python.
I have looked at the Dive Into Python code but the SOAPpy module does not work under Python 2.5.
I have tried using suds which works partly, but breaks with certain types (suds.TypeNotFound: Type not found: 'item').
I have also looked at Client but this does not appear to support WSDL.
And I have looked at ZSI but it looks very complex.
Does anyone have any sample code for it?
The WSDL is https://ws.pingdom.com/soap/PingdomAPI.wsdl and works fine with the PHP 5 SOAP client.
